artist: Larsen Design Studio; Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Tan warp. Tan, lt. green, silver weft for 1/2.  Then silver changes to gold & lt. green for the 2nd 1/2. Machine edgd all 4 sides. Stabled inside mat folder with Larsen descriptive label.  "upholstery yarn Dye El79" written on outside.
title: Plum Tree
